languages.text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.
languages.original_text: Архмилитант получает эффект "осторожный подход", который сохраняется до конца боя, до следующего применения этой способности или до применения Решительного подхода. Вместо обычных бонусов от "универсальности" за каждый уровень этого эффекта архмилитант получает +5% к уклонению и парированию. Если уровней "универсальности" накоплено 4 или больше, то с архмилитанта снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и отравления. На время действия "осторожного подхода" архмилитант получает иммунитет к этим эффектам, а также к оглушению и опрокидыванию.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran gains a Cautious Approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until the use of Confident Approach. Instead of usual bonuses from Right Tool for the Job, the Veteran gains +5 dodge and parry for every stack. If the Veteran already has 4 or more stacks of Right Tool for the Job, the Veteran removes all slowed, blinded, bleeding, burning, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects as well as to stun and prone, for as long as the Veteran sticks to Cautious Approach.

The Veteran gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from right tool for the job, the Veteran gains +5 dodge and parry for every stack. If the Veteran already has 4 or more stacks of right tool for the job, the Veteran removes all slowed, blinded, bleeding, burning, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects as well as stun and prone for as long as the Veteran keeps the cautious approach effect active.

The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

languages.text: 首席战士获得“步步为营”效果，此效果持续至战斗结束，或首席战士再次使用此能力，或首席战士使用激流勇进能力为止。此能力激活后，“多才多艺”的加成效果变为：每层“多才多艺”可使闪避与招架提高5%。 如果首席战士至少有4层“多才多艺”效果，则移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与毒素效果，并对上述效果与眩晕、倒地效果免疫。只要“步步为营”处于激活状态，此效果就始终生效。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

traits.locale_text: 老兵获得“步步为营”效果，此效果持续至战斗结束，或老兵再次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，或老兵使用激流勇进能力为止。此能力激活后，“合适装备”的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果变为：每层“合适装备”可使{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高5%。 如果老兵至少有4层“合适装备”效果，则移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}，并对上述效果与{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}效果免疫。只要“步步为营”处于激活状态，此效果就始终生效。

首席战士获得“步步为营”效果，此效果持续至战斗结束，或首席战士再次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，或首席战士使用激流勇进能力为止。此能力激活后，“多才多艺”的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果变为：每层“多才多艺”可使{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高5%。 如果首席战士至少有4层“多才多艺”效果，则移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果，并对上述效果与{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}效果免疫。只要“步步为营”处于激活状态，此效果就始终生效。

languages.text: El Archimilitante obtiene el efecto Enfoque cauteloso hasta el final del combate, hasta que vuelva a usar esta capacidad o hasta que use Enfoque confiado. En vez de las bonificaciones habituales de Versatilidad, el Archimilitante gana +5 % de esquiva y de parada por cada acumulación. Si el Archimilitante tiene 4 o más acumulaciones de Versatilidad, se cura de los estados {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y se vuelve inmune a estos efectos además de a {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} mientras el efecto de Enfoque cauteloso esté activo.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

traits.locale_text: El Archimilitante obtiene el efecto Enfoque cauteloso hasta el final del combate, hasta que vuelva a usar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o hasta que use Enfoque confiado. En vez de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} habituales de Herramienta adecuada, el Archimilitante gana +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} por cada acumulación. Si el Archimilitante tiene 4 o más acumulaciones de Herramienta adecuada, se cura de los estados {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y se vuelve inmune a estos efectos además de a aturdido y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} mientras el efecto de Enfoque cauteloso esté activo.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントが戦闘終了まで、またはこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}をもう一度使用するまで、または積極接近を使用するまで警戒接近の効果が継続する。汎用性から得られる通常の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の代わりに、アーク・ミリタントがスタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を+5ずつ獲得する。 汎用性を4スタック以上所有している場合、アーク・ミリタントは自身にかけられている{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}火傷{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}効果をすべて取り除き、警戒接近の効果が有効であるかぎりこれらの効果と{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}に対して耐性がつく。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

traits.locale_text: 古参（ベテラン）が戦闘終了まで、またはこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}をもう一度使用するまで、または積極接近を使用するまで警戒接近の効果が継続する。適切な手段から得られる通常の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の代わりに、古参（ベテラン）がスタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を+5ずつ獲得する。 適切な手段を4スタック以上所有している場合、古参（ベテラン）は自身にかけられている{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}火傷{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}効果をすべて取り除き、警戒接近の効果が有効であるかぎりこれらの効果と{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}に対して耐性がつく。

languages.text: Архмилитант получает эффект "осторожный подход", который сохраняется до конца боя, до следующего применения этой способности или до применения Решительного подхода. Вместо обычных бонусов от "универсальности" за каждый уровень этого эффекта архмилитант получает +5% к уклонению и парированию. Если уровней "универсальности" накоплено 4 или больше, то с архмилитанта снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и отравления. На время действия "осторожного подхода" архмилитант получает иммунитет к этим эффектам, а также к оглушению и опрокидыванию.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

traits.locale_text: Ветеран получает эффект "осторожный подход", который сохраняется до конца боя, до следующего применения этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} или до применения Решительного подхода. Вместо обычных {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} от "подходящего способа" за каждый уровень этого эффекта ветеран получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}. Если уровней "подходящего способа" накоплено 4 или больше, то с ветерана снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. На время действия "осторожного подхода" ветеран получает иммунитет к этим эффектам, а также к {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}.

Ветеран получает эффект "осторожный подход", который сохраняется до конца боя, до следующего применения этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} или до применения Решительного подхода. Вместо обычных {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} от "подходящего способа" за каждый уровень этого эффекта ветеран получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}. Если уровней "подходящего способа" накоплено 4 или больше, то с ветерана снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. На время действия "осторожного подхода" ветеран получает иммунитет к этим эффектам, а также к {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}.

languages.text: Der Erzmilitant erhält den Effekt "Vorsichtiges Vorgehen" bis zum Ende des Kampfes oder bis diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut oder Selbstbewusstes Vorgehen genutzt wird. Anstatt der üblichen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} durch Vielseitigkeit erhält der Erzmilitant für jeden Stapel +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}. Sollte der Erzmilitant bereits 4 oder mehr Stapel Vielseitigkeit haben, entfernt der Erzmilitant sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-Effekte von sich selbst. Außerdem wird er immun gegen diese Effekte und zusätzlich gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}, solange er den Effekt „Vorsichtiges Vorgehen“ aktiv hält.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

traits.locale_text: Der Erzmilitant erhält bis zum Ende des Kampfes den Effekt Vorsichtiges Vorgehen, andernfalls bis diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut oder Selbstbewusstes Vorgehen zum ersten Mal genutzt wird. Anstatt der üblichen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job erhält der Erzmilitant für jeden Stapel +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}. Sollte der Erzmilitant bereits 4 oder mehr Stapel von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job haben, entfernt der Erzmilitant sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-Effekte von sich selbst. Außerdem wird er immun gegen diese Effekte und zusätzlich gegen Betäubung und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}, so lange der Erzmilitant den Effekt Vorsichtiges Vorgehen aktiv hält.

languages.text: L'archimilitant bénéficie de l'effet Approche prudente jusqu'à la fin du combat, jusqu'à ce que cette capacité soit à nouveau utilisée ou qu'il utilise Approche confiante. Au lieu des bonus habituels de Polyvalence, l'archimilitant bénéficie de +5 % d'esquive et de parade par cumul. Si l'archimilitant possède déjà au moins 4 cumuls de Polyvalence, il se libère des effets {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion {/g}et Toxine, et devient invulnérable à ceux-ci ainsi qu'aux effets Étourdissement et Paralysie tant que l'effet Approche prudente reste actif.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.

traits.locale_text: Le Vétéran bénéficie de l'effet d'Approche Prudente jusqu'à la fin du combat, jusqu'à ce que cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} soit à nouveau utilisée ou jusqu'à ce qu'il utilise Approche Confiante. Au lieu des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} habituels d'Outil Adéquat, le Vétéran bénéficie de +5 d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} par cumul. Si le Vétéran possède déjà au moins 4 cumuls d'Outil Adéquat, il se libère des effets {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et devient invulnérable à ceux-ci ainsi qu'aux effets {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Immobilisation{/g} tant que l'effet d'Approche Prudente reste actif.

languages.text: Başmilitan, temkinli yaklaşım etkisi kazanır. Bu etki çatışma sonuna, bu kabiliyet tekrar kullanılana veya Öz Güvenli Yaklaşım kullanılana dek sürer. Başmilitan, çok yönlülükten gelen olağan bonuslar yerine her birikim için +%5 kaçınma ve savuşturma kazanır. Başmilitan; 4 veya daha fazla çok yönlülük birikimine sahipse ve temkinli yaklaşım etkisi devam ediyorsa üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} ve toksin etkileri ortadan kalkar. Ayrıca hem bu etkilere hem de sersemlik ve yere devrilmeye karşı bağışıklık kazanır.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant gains the cautious approach effect until the end of combat, or until this ability is used again, or until using Confident Approach. Instead of the usual bonuses from versatility, the Arch-Militant gains +5% dodge and parry for every stack. If the Arch-Militant already has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant removes all {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and toxin effects from themselves and becomes immune to these effects, as well as stunned and prone, for as long as the Arch-Militant keeps the cautious approach effect active.
